price: De ki: “Ey insanlar! Ben sizin için ancak apaçık bir uyarıcıyım.''
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
